TMAbstractEdge INTERNAL: Common abstract superclass for all edges representing Topic Maps constructs.

TMAssociationEdge INTERNAL: Edge class representing binary associations as edges.

TMRoleEdge INTERNAL: Edge class representing association roles as edges in n-ary associations connecting role player with the association node.
TMTopicNode INTERNAL: Node class representing topics.
TopicMapView INTERNAL: Maintains the TouchGraph view of the topic map.

TypesConfigFrame This class provides a display to allow the user to define which colours are used when displaying associations of this type.
